motd.title: Message from the Dreadnought Discord
motd.body:
Experiencing a bug? Remember to submit it to the in-game bug reporter and then let the Discord Mod Team know by also filling out this form: https://goo.gl/3eBE12
Want to help track the severity of bugs? Go vote in #known-bugs! Check the pinned message for how to vote! We will be putting out a new batch of bugs to vote on nightly around 7PM CST.
--
Release Summary 2.6.1: - Added a tool that allows switching the modules to Azerty keys instead of the default of Qwerty - Fixed a bug that would cause the menu icons to render at abnormal sizes for some people
